events.message: I received my order today but the product is broken. There is a large scratch on the surface and it does not work properly.
The issue has been identified as a product defect based on the reported scratch and malfunction.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product specialists who will assist you further.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damage. I’m here to help get this resolved for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched part and let us know if the device powers on at all?
I’ve just attached photos showing the scratch clearly, and unfortunately the product does not switch on at all.
Thank you for the details. We can send a replacement product at no additional cost or issue a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement, thank you. I really liked the product and hope the next one works fine.
A replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within the next two business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement and that everything is working well now.
I got the replacement today. It works perfectly, and I’m very happy with how quickly you handled this.
Thank you for confirming. We are closing this case now, but please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
